name: Meowfia
description:
Play as a cat being recruited to the Meowfia, a vicious gang of cats set on running the back alleys, no matter the cost! Jump to safety, complete covert hand-offs, and take down a rival boss!

Meowfia is not for the faint of heart, just like being a Meowfioso requires street smarts. Search the game for power-ups, and make sure you stay on the good side of the Meowfia boss, or else risk sleeping with the fishes! We're sure you'll do fine, who doesn't want to be part of the Family?

Project Contributors:

Cynthia Gainey: Programming, UI

Leah Holm: Illustration, Modeling, Marketing, Texturing, UI Design

Matthew Chastain: Environmental Modeling

Dylan Cranford: Environmental Modeling and Textures

Caitlin Conrad: Documentation, Modeling

Franco Parodi: Implementation, Level Design

Andrew Sentoso: Animation, Rigging
